price: So We will surely question those to whom the messengers were sent, and We will surely question the messengers themselves.
arabic: فَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
